attributes.action: Make it 10 years in jail if caught with a knife
attributes.additional_details: The lack of police funding, backed up by the lack of opportunities is making many people do crazy things. Knife crime & murder is happening way too frequently, I’m sure for everyones liking, so please make stronger sentences for theses crimes as lifes will be saved.
attributes.background: There is way too many people being caught up in knife crime & there needs to be a strong deterrent to prevent this type of crime. Too many people are losing their loved ones
